cleaned_text: Donald C Perrine, MD Pain Medicine Locations SPI New Seasons Pain Management SHMG Pain Management Hudson About Donald C Perrine Dr. Donald Perrine is a member of Summa Health's Interventional Pain Management team. His special interests include spinal cord stimulation, interventional pain medicine, cancer pain, multimodal/multidisciplinary pain management and opioid-sparing pain management. He graduated from Northeast Ohio Medical University and interned at Mount Carmel Health in general surgery. Dr. Perrine also completed a residency in anesthesiology and a fellowship in pain medicine at the University of Illinois. Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health.
